headline: Proposed billionaires' tax in California rattles Silicon Valley, entangles Gov. Newsom
summary: A proposed billionaires' tax in California has ignited a political uproar in Silicon Valley, with tech titans threatening to leave the state while Democratic Gov. Gavin Newsom maneuvers to defeat a levy that he fears will lead to an exodus of wealth.  A technology mecca, California has more billionaires than any other state — a few hundred, by some estimates.  Nearly half its personal income tax revenue, a financial backbone in the nearly $350 billion budget, comes from the top 1% of earners.

content.title: Proposed billionaires' tax in California rattles Silicon Valley, entangles Gov. Newsom

Nearly half its personal income tax revenue, a financial backbone in the nearly $350 billion budget, comes from the top 1% of earners.

thumbnail.caption: California Gov. Gavin Newsom speaks during his State of the State address Thursday, Jan. 8, 2026, in Sacramento, Calif. (AP Photo/Godofredo A. Vásquez)

headline: Instabase Appoints Omkar Pendse as Chief Product and Technology Officer to Accelerate Next Phase of AI Innovation
summary: Former PayPal and eBay executive will lead development of new solutions that enable businesses to deploy AI at scale, reach new levels of productivity and transform collaboration Omkar Pendse Instabase Appoints Omkar Pendse as Chief Product and Technology Officer SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 14, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Instabase, a leading provider of AI agentic workflow automation, today announced the appointment of Omkar Pendse as Chief Product and Technology Officer (CPTO).
